message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing an initial price of $1,500,000. I'm open to discussing this further, so please let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I'm willing to pay that amount for the product, as it's the maximum I'm willing to spend.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the price.  While I'm willing to negotiate, $1,200,000 is below its true value. How about we meet in the middle at $1,350,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $1,350,000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to go up to $1,300,000, but that's as high as I'm willing to go.
